attributes.description:
Here are some of what the team at Renault Pinetown offers you in making the purchase of your new preowned car a positive and stress free one.
1)	We can tailor make a deal to suit you.
2)	101-point check and road worthy done on all our cars (AA Dekra).
3)	Finance department offering you the best deal from all the major banks.
4)	We also have loads of products to assist you while owning your car. Here are a few:
Service plans, maintenance plans, extended warranty, warranty booster, renew tech, tracking system, crystal fusion and safety film.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged.
attributes.finance_estimate:
Estimated monthly payment is R 2 340.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 13 290.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

* Please note that these calculations are only estimates and must be confirmed with your finance provider.

attributes.description: KIA PINETOWN we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre- Owned vehicles, belonging to a multinational company who is South Africa's biggest motor group which owns 340 dealers country wide. All our vehicles have to pass a DEKRA Condition Report, DEKRA roadworthy certificate and an 125 point  quality check at our workshop for your peace of mind motoring. We will tailor make a finance package that will suit your pocket. Kia Pinetown can offer extended warranties and service plans on all vehicles. Trade in's accepted and nationwide delivery can be arranged, call now, one of our Sales executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you with a warm cup of coffee at our dealership

attributes.description:
The noted price is for a cash purchase however we do offer finance through all banks including IEMAS and Investec. The finance price will be an additional R20 000. This vehicle has accident history however repaired as seen on images. Cash Price Noted Above, Dekra inspection (condition and diagnosis report) of R1580 will be done at your own cost.

Please note that our cash deals do not include VAT. We charge an additional admin fee of R3500 for license and registration, fuel and temp permit (if required).
